ai-ja410:1.1_0: “In the past I am throwing me out,
ai-ja410:1.2_0: In the wilderness, if it is far from the wilderness,
ai-ja410:1.3_0: He will not see a donor,
ai-ja410:2.2_0: like a freshly painted by the back.
ai-ja410:2.3_0: if it is a fearful, white;
ai-ja410:3.1_0: “For he who has gone to the village,
ai-ja410:3.2_0: For the one free and mindful,
ai-ja410:3.3_0: it’s not good to see the ascetic,
ai-ja410:4.3_0: heart from the throne of the heart
ai-ja410:4.4_0: it is not possible to grieve.”
ai-ja410:5.4_0: And the fool, peaceful and strive,
ai-ja410:6.3_0: all the crooks, together with the Saṅgha,
ai-ja410:7.3_0: like a drilling the head with the wind.
ai-ja410:8.1_0: For you have plucked the dart from me,
ai-ja410:8.2_0: When they’re released from the heart
ai-ja410:8.4_0: in which I once was mired.
ai-ja410:9.2_0: free of greed, free of hate,
